name: Magenta kitchen
description: Since 1990, Magenta Kitchen has prided itself on being one of the best restaurants, a testament to its enduring legacy of excellence. Situated in the heart of California's culinary capital, Magenta Kitchen has become a beloved institution, cherished by locals and revered by food enthusiasts from around the globe.

sections.name: Picaderas
sections.description: Deliciosas opciones para compartir con amigos y familiares. ¡Sabores que te sorprenderán en cada bocado!

items.name: Papas fritas
items.ingredients: Potatoes, peanut oil, sea salt, fresh herbs, garlick cloves, parmesan cheese, black pepper.
items.description: French fries are incredibly versatile and are often enjoyed with burgers, sandwiches, or as a standalone snack. Their simplicity allows for a wide array of flavor variations, making them a popular and comforting treat across diverse cuisines and dining experiences.

sections.name: Pizzas
sections.description: Tu rica Pizza Cubana con la esencia de Italia
